strings.ARTIFACT_DEATH_CURSE_DESCRIPTION: Adds Death Curse on revive, but also adds Charon's Obol item that will make revive easier.
strings.ARTIFACT_DEATH_CURSE_DISABLED: Artifact of Death Curse is disabled because run started in single player.
strings.ARTIFACT_DEATH_CURSE_ENFORCED_BY_SERVER: Artifact of Death Curse is enforced by server.
strings.ITEM_CHARONS_OBOL_DESCRIPTION:
- Reduces <color="yellow">revival time</color>. 
- Can be consumed for <color="yellow">instant</color> revival without Death Curse. 
- <color="yellow">Removes</color> additional <color="red">Death Curse</color> on stage change.
- Increase <color="yellow">range</color> and decrease <color="yellow">damage</color> for your revival.
strings.ITEM_CHARONS_OBOL_PICKUP: Makes revival easier. Can be consumed for instant revival.
strings.ITEM_REVIVE_EVERYWHERE_DESCRIPTION:
- <color="yellow">Revive</color> dead teammates <color="yellow">everywhere</color> on map.
- First item <color="red">increases</color> <color="yellow">revival time</color> by x2.
- Every subsequent item decreases <color="yellow">revival time</color> when you are reviving
strings.ITEM_REVIVE_EVERYWHERE_LORE: Revive death teammates everywhere on map
strings.ITEM_REVIVE_EVERYWHERE_PICKUP: Revive death teammates everywhere on map
strings.ITEM_DEATH_CURSE_DESCRIPTION: Reduces your max HP/Shield. Removed on next stage.
strings.ITEM_DEATH_CURSE_LORE: Reduces your max HP/Shield. Removed on next stage.
strings.ITEM_DEATH_CURSE_PICKUP: Reduces your max HP/Shield. Removed on next stage.
strings.BUFF_REVIVE_LINK_DESCRIPTION: Marks that character will receive Death curse when dead character is revived. Removed after some time.
strings.BUFF_REVIVE_REGEN_DESCRIPTION: Rapidly regenerates 40% of your HP after revival.
strings.TEAMMATE_REVIVAL_UI_USE_OBOL: Use <color="green">Charon's Obol</color> to revive (<color="red">Reduces Max Hp/Shield</color>)
strings.TEAMMATE_REVIVAL_UI_NO_OBOL: Cannot instantly resurrect without Charon's Obol!
strings.TEAMMATE_REVIVAL_SHIELD_ONLY_POSTFIX: Teammate reviving will damage shield instead of health.
